abstract: Armenian Prime Min Hovik Abrahamyan refuses to revoke electricity price increase despite thousands of protesters blocking main avenue in capital city Yerevan for four days.
lead_paragraph: The prime minister’s comments came as thousands of protesters continued their round-the-clock blockade of the main avenue of the capital.

headline.main: Armenia: Impasse Over a Price Increase
headline.print_headline: Europe; Armenia: Impasse Over a Price Increase

snippet: The prime minister’s comments came as thousands of protesters continued their round-the-clock blockade of the main avenue of the capital.
